
## Publications

### Accepted

```{r accepted-papers}
library("dplyr")

accepted = bibliography_entries(
  here::here("bibliography", "accepted.bib")
)

accepted %>%
  arrange(issued)

```

### Preprints

```{r preprints}
preprints = vitae::bibliography_entries(
  here::here("bibliography", "preprints.bib")
)

preprints %>%
  arrange(issued)
```

### Published

```{r published-papers}
papers = bibliography_entries(
  here::here("bibliography", "papers.bib")
)

papers %>%
  arrange(issued)
```
